metadata.title: CVE-2020-36421 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Arm Mbed TLS before 2.23.0. Because of a sidechannel in modular exponentiation, an RSA private key used in a secureenclave could be disclosed.

criterions.comment: mbedtls: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
